tool_description: Analyze sentiment of financial text, giving the scores for three labels: positive, negative or neutral.
name: Financial Sentiment Analysis
title: Financial Sentiment Analysis

api_list.name: Financial Sentiment Analysis
api_list.description: Classify sentiment in financial English text. Powered by AI.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://financial-sentiment-analysis4.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financial-sentiment-analysis4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://financial-sentiment-analysis4.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financial-sentiment-analysis4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
